summary: Lucinda, Rob and their 117 cows lead a charmed existence in a magic land. He milks, she's the honey. But Lucinda is worried that their happiness cannot last. She tests their love with a game of sabotage that threatens to curdle everything.
cast: Danielle Cormack|Karl Urban|Willa O'Neill|Michael Lawrence|Rangi Motu|Lawrence Makoare|Chris Graham|Ray Bishop|Toi Iti|Bobby Tau|Luke Hiki|Michael Sweeney|Tahuna Minhinnick|Hiku Minhinnick|Karaka Taupa|Louis King|Wairere Iti|Rajeev Varma|Jeram Bhana|Leila Dahya|Mailhu G. Hari|Nirmala Uka|Connor Nourse|Hemant Parikh|Bharat Puri Gofwamai|Vaju Bhai Parmai
title: El precio de la leche
